topics.body:
Hey guys, I've got an unpopular opinion here!

*BEGIN RANT*
I don't like porn or fetishes. I'm a straight, clean guy who refrains from indulging in that kind of stuff, because of personal and religious reasons. I may have a profanity problem in real life (which is why I tend to censor myself sometimes), but I do not want to engage in any sexual activities or interests. At least, until I'm possibly married.

But that doesn't mean I look down upon you guys for having these bizarre interests and fetishes of yours, even if they do come off as creepy. I'm a guy who follows the idea of 'love the sinner, hate the sin'. Just wanted to get off my soapbox and confess what I've been hiding from you guys ever since I logged onto the thread for the first time.

It's not me, it's just I'm a guy who tries to come off as 'clean'. But I'm not going to stop you from having your fun. I'll just have to be careful and not resort to bleaching my brain every time one of you post some porn/hentai/fetish/whatever.
*END RANT*

BTW, what kind of content is allowed and what isn't allowed? What's the limit?
topics.author: 536f7a11636872666e2d0000

topics.body:
"@ToskiHero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b0c3656368721fa4430200#post_54b0c3656368721fa4430200
If it's illegal, Don't post it at all, If It isn't, Make sure to spoiler it if the thread's not NSFW. (Or in the general board at all)

Also, I feel a bit iffed, But I respect you for not going the same route as a lot of religious people do in NSFW territory.
